oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Scottish Agricultural College (SAC): Organic demonstration farms
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Root crops
Vegetables
Pigs
Sheep and goats
Crop husbandry
Beef cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1. Godscroft Abbey, Duns - upland mixed farm 750 ha (576 ha crops and grass. 1800 breeding ewes and 160 suckler cows. 2. East Mains, Dundee - lowland mixed farm 160 ha (all ploughable). 60 breeding ewes, 60 suckler cows, finishing pigs (2000 per annum). 4 ha vegetables, 25 ha seed potatoes
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: {Facility} SAC: Scottish Agricultural College (SAC): Organic demonstration farms. Facility Leader(s): Younie, David, Scottish Agricultural College.
